Title: Soaked in Success
Description:
Fishermen of our tribe are constantly plagued with waterlogged packs and boots. Lately, the riverbeasts have been swarming fishing spots and causing even more mayhem.

The hide of the riverbeasts are quite slick and water-resistant. Perhaps we can handle two problems at once. If you could help handle the over abundance of riverbeasts and bring back their hides, our fishers would be quite pleased.
ObjectivesText: Gather 18 Waterproof Hide from the riverbeasts of the Dragon Isles for Temnaayu of the Iskaara Tuskarr.
